definitions.definition: Tied , strapped , especially with tethers or hobbles .
connected (especially a mobile phone to a computer, for use as a wireless modem)
examples: Many mobile phones are equipped with software to offer tethered Internet access.

main_definition: ( veterinary medicine ) Tied , strapped , especially with tethers or hobbles .
secondary_definitions: ( computing , electronics ) connected (especially a mobile phone to a computer, for use as a wireless modem)
